title: El Sistema's top youth orchestra
description: The Teresa Carreño Youth Orchestra contains the best high school musicians from Venezuela's life-changing music program, El Sistema. Led here by Gustavo Dudamel, they play Shostakovich's Symphony No. 10, 2nd movement, and Arturo Márquez' Danzón No. 2.
author: Gustavo Dudamel and the Teresa Carreño Youth Orchestra
keywords: TED, talks, TED Prize, children, conducting, culture, education, entertainment, music, performance, live music
